channel.title: ebook on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in ebook on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Mad Props To The Pragmatic Programmers
item.description: Earlier this morning I received the following email from The Pragmatic Programmers: Dear Og Maciel, This is just to let you know that Pragmatic Guide to Git (eBook) has recently been updated. You own an electronic version of this book, and so you’ll be able to download this latest version. We have also sent it to Amazon.com for delivery to your kindle. Changes in This Release Third printing: includes a few minor errata fixes.
